amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Career and Technical Education (CTE) State Grants by $70,246,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 167 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase funding for Career and Technical Education (CTE) State Grants by $70,246,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lewis (MN) amendment (A143) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 263, 1 Present (Roll no. 508).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lewis (MN) amendment (A143) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 263, 1 Present (Roll no. 508).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A143) offered by Mr. Lewis (MN).
